description: Proposed works: Retrospective approval for front windows/door replacement, installation of an additional A/C unit.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2878ab28-7fff-d383-8b49-1e436376dbe4"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed windows and front door, by reason of their materials, colour, proportions, and depth of glazing bars, are inappropriate and unsympathetic alterations to the host property that are visually harmful and out of keeping with surrounding development. The proposal therefore fails to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area and its setting and the applications site's designation as a building of townscape merit,&nbsp; contrary to policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies LP1, LP3 and LP4 of the Hackney Local Plan (2020).</span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-fe61a4ea-7fff-51c6-3181-94d007a0686e"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed AC units, by reason of their size, location and industrial appearance are inappropriate and unsympathetic additions to the property that are out of keeping with surrounding development thereby failing to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area and its setting and the application site's designation as a building of townscape merit,&nbsp; contrary to policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies LP1, LP3 and LP4 of the Hackney Local Plan (2020).</span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cafe3f86-7fff-a892-f411-4e0e6711afc9"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed AC units are capable of creating a noise and vibration nuisance that could result in an unacceptable detrimental impact on amenity and it has not been demonstrated otherwise, according their addition is considered to be contrary to D14 of The London Plan 2021 and LP2 of LP33. </span></span><br></p>
